messages.message: A getting started guide has appeared!

The air thrums, not with wings alone, but with the ghost-echoes of every feathered form, every rooted being known to the far-seeing eye of Mother Nature. What will you summon from the boundless library of life?

Emerald seeped through the thinness, spores on unseen currents, holding the rhizomes of possibility.Tendrils, finer than moonlight, unfurled from longing, weaving a tapestry of green. They drank not water, but the raw seeds and dreams of the Realm
